      • prepareQuery

        public static org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.Query prepareQuery(org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryConnection connection,
                                                         java.lang.String query)
                                                  throws org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                                         org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryException
        Prepares (parses) any kind of SPARQL query.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection to a repository
        query - a SPARQL query in text form
        Returns:
        the prepared query (an instance of TupleQuery, BooleanQuery etc.)
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.MalformedQueryException
        org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryException

                                                                           org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Evaluates a SPARQL SELECT query and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection to a repository
        query - a SPARQL SELECT query in text form
        bindings - optional bindings to set on the prepared query
        Returns:
        a TupleQueryResult that can be used to retrieve bindings
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.MalformedQueryException

        Evaluates a SPARQL CONSTRUCT query and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection to a repository
        query - a SPARQL CONSTRUCT query in text form
        bindings - optional bindings to set on the prepared query
        Returns:
        a GraphQueryResult that can be used to retrieve the graph
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.MalformedQueryException

      • evaluateAskQuery

        public static boolean evaluateAskQuery(org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryConnection connection,
                                       java.lang.String query,
                                       org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.Binding... bindings)
                                throws org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                       org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryException,
                                       org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Evaluates a SPARQL ASK query and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection to a repository
        query - a SPARQL ASK query in text form
        bindings - optional bindings to set on the prepared query
        Returns:
        a boolean that represents the result of the ASK query
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.MalformedQueryException
        org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryException
        org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.QueryEvaluationException
